articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Trump can’t handle the foreign policy debate America needs - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Beware the cheap and demagogic narratives delivered on American debate stages about complicated foreign wars.
articles.content: Im bracing myself for the cringefest of oversimplification, misrepresentation and outright mendacity that Americans call a presidential debate. Pundits will declare either Joe Biden or Donald Trump t… [+6585 chars]

articles.author: EastIdahoNews.com Staff
articles.title: Native American ceremony will celebrate birth of white buffalo calf in Yellowstone park - East Idaho News
articles.description: HELENA, Montana (AP) — Ceremonies and celebrations are planned Wednesday near the west entrance of Yellowstone National Park to mark the recent birth of a white buffalo calf in the park, a spiritually significant event for many Native American tribes. A white…
